mapper.update: update MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH set MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH_NAME = #{multipleResourceGraphName_}, MEASUREMENT_ITEM_ID_LIST = #{measurementItemIdList_}, MEASUREMENT_ITEM_PATTERN = #{measurementItemPattern_} where MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH_NAME = #{multipleResourceGraphName_}
mapper.delete: delete from MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH where MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH_NAME like #{multipleResourceGraphNameRe_}
mapper.select: SELECT MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH_ID FROM MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH where MULTIPLE_RESOURCE_GRAPH_NAME = #{multipleResourceGraphName_}

SELECT split_part(multiple_resource_graph_name, '/', #{childLength}) AS child ,split_part(multiple_resource_graph_name ,'/', #{grandChildLength}) != '' AS grandchild FROM multiple_resource_graph WHERE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(multiple_resource_graph_name, CHR(13) || CHR(10), ' '), CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' ') LIKE #{searchTreeId} AND split_part(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(multiple_resource_graph_name, CHR(13) || CHR(10), ' '), CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' ') ,'/' ,#{length}) = #{selfElementName} GROUP BY child ,grandchild ORDER BY child ,grandchild
